About me

Hi! My name is Tristan White, I'm a designer, developer and somewhat unicorn-like. I was born and raised in a small town in Denmark. Today I am proud to call myself a full-stack web developer.
I love making beautiful, yet practical websites and applications and I would enjoy the opportunity to collaborate on your next project, so drop me an email or a tweet and lets get to work!
